titles.title: THERE IS A RIVER WHOSE STREAMS

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a river whose streams
Make glad the city of our God. (2x)
Chorus:
And I will rejoice,
I will rejoice, and be glad. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is a fountain full of grace,
And it flows from Emmanuel's veins.
It came and it healed me.
It came and it filled me.
It came and it washed my sins away.
